about.mnemonic:
## What are Mnemonic Phrases? 
 Mnemonic phrases, also known as mnemonic seeds or recovery phrases, are essential in the world of cryptocurrencies. They consist of a sequence of 12, 18, or 24 words generated when users create a new wallet. This sequence allows access to funds in the wallet.

## How do Mnemonic Phrases Work?

These phrases contain all necessary information to recover your digital assets if your wallet is lost or damaged. It's crucial to write down the phrase in the exact order and keep it secret, as anyone with access can use it to access your wallet.
 Mnemonic phrases are generated through the BIP-39 specification, which starts with creating random bits (initial entropy). The length of this entropy determines the length of the mnemonic phrase. A checksum is added to make it human-friendly and error-resistant, then the phrase is encoded using the PBKDF2 hash function.

about-mnemonic.description.1: Mnemonic phrases, also known as mnemonic seeds or recovery phrases, are essential in the world of cryptocurrencies. They consist of a sequence of 12, 18, or 24 words generated when users create a new wallet. This sequence allows access to funds in the wallet (We do not have access to your wallet and we are not able to block access to it, because we are not saving your secret phrases).
about-mnemonic.description.2: These phrases contain all necessary information to recover your digital assets if your wallet is lost or damaged. It's crucial to write down the phrase in the exact order and keep it secret, as anyone with access can use it to access your wallet.
about-mnemonic.description.3: Mnemonic phrases are generated through the BIP-39 specification, which starts with creating random bits (initial entropy). The length of this entropy determines the length of the mnemonic phrase. A checksum is added to make it human-friendly and error-resistant, then the phrase is encoded using the PBKDF2 hash function.
